name: 7 Ways To Die
description:
Play through this "Action - Adventure" game inspired by Reventure, where dying spawns Useful Items!

.

Made in 2 Days for Mini Jam 92: Death

.

no there are no sounds on the game it's not your PC :)

i will update it with sounds very soon...

any Feedback is appreciated!

.

controls:

Move: A/D  -  L arrow/ R arrow

Jump: Space

Pickup: Shift

Interact: E

To Main Menu: Esx 

.
